issue.title: faq.subaru.jp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://faq.subaru.jp/faq/show/8205?back=front%2Fcategory%3Asearch&category_id=162&commit=&form_type=advanced_search&is_solr_except=true&keyword=Android+Auto&page=1&search_category_narrow_down=162&site_domain=default&site_id=1&sort=sort_keyword&sort_order=desc](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffaq.subaru.jp%2Ffaq%2Fshow%2F8205%3Fback%3Dfront%252Fcategory%253Asearch%26category_id%3D162%26commit%3D%26form_type%3Dadvanced_search%26is_solr_except%3Dtrue%26keyword%3DAndroid%2BAuto%26page%3D1%26search_category_narrow_down%3D162%26site_domain%3Ddefault%26site_id%3D1%26sort%3Dsort_keyword%26sort_order%3Ddesc) ### Comment > https://faq.subaru.jp/faq/show/656?back=front%2Fcategory%3Ashow&category_id=163&page=1&site_domain=default&sort=sort_access&sort_order=desc > にAdguardが有効でアクセスするとページが表示されません。 > 保護を無効にすると表示されます。 > また、ブラウザの拡張機能で、フィルタリングOFFにしてもつながりません。保護無効ににしないとつながりません。 > > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/71hj4soi3dogwok008k0wwg44gcwgs86hzhn8dif2c.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/kkrwas63epco40gw8o0cckkkok04os4lkeysnd4yrk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Windows 11 Pro 24H2` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `quic://dns.adguard-dns.com`
Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard French,
AdGuard Chinese,
EasyList Czech and Slovak Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.google.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F) Other extensions used: | `ESET` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.0+%285225%29&system_version=Windows+11+Pro+24H2&browser=chrome&filters=2.3.4.6.7.10.16.17.105.224&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=quic%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fassistant%252F4.3%252Fassistant.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=false&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fwww.google.com%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true)

issue.title: grabify.link
